title: EIP-7623: Increase calldata cost
description: Increases the gas cost of calldata to better reflect its resource usage and improve network efficiency.
author: Toni Wahrst√§tter, Vitalik Buterin
laymanDescription: Calldata gas costs is increased to limit state growth and incentivize more efficient blobs to store data.

endUsers.description: Normal transactions see no change, contracts relying on calldata become a little more expensive to execute.

appDevs.description: Contracts behaviour is not changed  but the state storage is more expensive.

walletDevs.description: Fee estimation may adjust for new calldata cost.

toolingInfra.description: Contract and gas analytics need reflect updated calldata pricing.

layer2s.description: L2s should use blobs over calldata, improving network scalability.

elClients.description: Adjust EVM gas accounting for calldata.

benefits: Bounds worst-case block size for network safety and scalability
Encourages use of blobs for large data
